useCase.name: Edit Settings
useCase.description: This use case describes the process of editing settings.

mainSequence.step: Admin requests to view the list of settings.
List Settings View sends request to SettingsController.
SettingsController retrieves the list of settings from SettingsModel.
SettingsModel returns the list of settings to SettingsController.
SettingsController returns the list of settings to List Settings View.
List Settings View displays the list of settings to Admin.
Admin edits settings and clicks the save button.
List Settings View sends new settings data to SettingsController.
SettingsController saves the new settings in SettingsModel.
SettingsModel returns the save result to SettingsController.
SettingsController returns the saved settings result to List Settings View.
List Settings View displays the updated list of settings to Admin.
